channel.title: New - Menacescape
channel.description:
[center]MenaceScape Revolved
The server base is clean v.4
The forums is running on SMF - [url=http://menacescape.byethost18.com/index.php]http://menacescape.byethost18.com/index.php[/url] Most lickely it will be intergrated with the server
Some quick links
[URL=http://"http://menacescape.byethost18.com/index.php?board=2.0"]Rules[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://menacescape.byethost18.com/index.php?board=3.0"]Suggestions[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://menacescape.byethost18.com/index.php?board=4.0"]Donations[/URL]
[b]|| Pictures || Videos ||[/b]
[b]Skills[/b]
[URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2hhhd79&s=4"]Attack[/URL]

Heblore - none

fletching - none yet

Fishing - none yet
Cooking - none yet
[URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=akec68&s=4"]Firemaking[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=akec68&s=4"]Wcing[/URL]
Farming - none
[b]None yet = i will add [/b]
[b]none = it wont have[/b]
[b]The Client[/b]
[URL=http://"http://i35.tinypic.com/2qcnyc6.png"]The front[/URL]

Client they have to much to show because i didn't do alot.
[b]The Server[/b]
[URL=http://"http://i33.tinypic.com/14abn84.png"]Starting[/URL]

[URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=9se5a0&s=4"]Training area[/URL]
Some other features
-Fight Cave -Added almost every silab item
Some coming features
-Quests -3 New mini-game -Some randoms new skills[/center]
